Service Details: - Offers 75 km of trails for cross country skiing, snowshoeing for all levels of skiers and snowshoers- Offers toboggan hill for children- Provides four cabins with woodstoves and toilets- New members enjoy free skate or classic lessons- Hosts a variety of social events during the season- Dogs are welcome on all snowshoe trails and 21 km of ski trails
Major Intersection: McCullouch Rd and Kettle Valley Rail Trail
